bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: UI overview page: bidirectional LSTM weights not shown
bug.description: Simple net: b-lstm + global pooling + output layer. Overview page doesn't show the b-lstm params... my guess: it's filtering "weights only" by "ends with W", which the b-lstm parameters don't end with (they have a B/F suffixes for forwards/backwards). <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2360237/24138179/5abd1fac-0e6b-11e7-8e05-0573b0b6f06e.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Shouldn't be. This was pre-bidirectional wrapper layer (and bidirectional LSTM was deprecated in 1.0.0-alpha)
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
